name: ornamentally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
for the purpose of looking beautiful rather than being useful: The skyscraper is ornamentally lit at night even when the offices inside are closed. These plants can be grown ornamentally to line paths in the garden.
More examplesFewer examplesThe rocks are not just ornamentally placed around the garden; they can also be placed to keep out animals. The brass lamps were ornamentally decorated at the corners with carvings of palm leaves. The gemstones were roughly polished and used ornamentally.
